price: 116. Rien, pour ceux qui ont mécru, ne servira contre Allah, ni leurs biens ni leurs enfants. Ce sont eux les hôtes du Feu, où ils séjourneront pour l’éternité.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū lan tugh'niya ʿanhum amwāluhum walā awlāduhum mina al-lahi shayan wa-ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
